title: Jayce ultimate to melee hammer , Ryze ult and Sions passiv
body: When the champion Jayce ults to his melee hammer (when he isnt in vision too) i always get a short lag (the screen always freezes for a second). The same thing happens when Ryze presses R and when Sions passiv dies. My brother ,who is playing on an other laptop has got the same problem.Its pretty a long time ago when we "found" this bug . I hope this bug will be fixed as soon as possible. (Im german but i thought its better to write this in english :)  )

replies.body: I guess your pc is too weak.

its not because my PC is too weak , i m playing LoL a pretty Long time and those "Bugs" came later.There werent there a long time ,they suddenly appeared. I know right when i played jayce and the other champs and those lags didnt happen ,but after  it always happens. I hope you understand me ^_^
ich hab das bei der neuen ryze ultimate auch
